ns8:component-version-script.script:
################################################################### #SCRIPT TO SET THE DNS OF THE MACHINE #ADDING MACHINE TO DOMAIN #RENAMING THE MACHINE NAME AFTER JOINING THE DOMAIN ###################################################################
#VALIDATION FUNCTIONS Function check_error { if ($error.count -gt 0) { error_exit $args[0] } }
Function error_exit { echo $args[0] exit $lastexitcode }
#GETTING THE VALUE OF ALTERNATE DNS WHICH IS THE DEFAULT DNS OF A MACHINE ipconfig /all | Select-String -pattern "DNS Servers" > c:\DNS.txt $ALTERNATE_DNS = (Get-Content C:\DNS.txt)[1] | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace " DNS Servers . . . . . . . . . . . : ",""} check_error "ERROR:WHILE GETTING DNS VALUE"
##BLOCK FOR SETTING THE DNS AND ALTERNATE DNS #SETTING THE DOMAIN CONTROLLER IP INTO THE DNS OF THE MACHINE IN WHICH MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER IS GOING TO BE INSTALLED netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Local Area Connection" source=static address="$DOMAIN_CONTROLLER_IP" primary check_error "ERROR:WHILE SETTING THE PRIMARY DNS OF THE MACHINE"
#SETTING THE ALTERNATE DNS netsh interface ipv4 add dnsserver name="Local Area Connection" address="$ALTERNATE_DNS" index=2 check_error "ERROR:WHILE SETTING ALTERNATE DNS" Write-Output "DOMAIN CONTROLLER IP SET TO THE DNS!!"
#GETTING THE MACHINE NAME $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() Write-Output $DOMAINJOIN
#ADDING THE MACHINE TO THE DOMAIN netdom join $DOMAINJOIN /domain:$DOMAIN /userd:$DOMAIN_USERNAME /passwordd:$DOMAIN_PASSWORD check_error "ERROR:WHILE ADDING MACHINE TO DOMAIN" Write-Output "MACHINE ADDED TO THE DOMAIN"
Set-ExecutionPolicy remotesigned -force #$NEWNAME= "EXCHINSALL" #NETDOM RENAMECOMPUTER $DOMAINJOIN /NewName:$NEWNAME /userd:$DOMAIN\$DOMAIN_USERNAME /passwordd:$DOMAIN_PASSWORD /Force

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#SAMPLE APPLICATION SCRIPT FOR EXCHANGE SERVER ############################################################################################################################ ##This sample application is for Testing the Installation of Microsoft Exchange Server on Windows 2008 R2 . ##In This sample application we are creating CSV file which has the informations of Different user we want ##to create for checking the installation we can create as many users as we want." ##After we have created the CSV file we are installing different pakages required for running NEW MAILBOX command. ##After that we are converting the password to Secure String so that it can be passed to the command. ##After that we are importing the CSV file we have created earlier. ##And Finally we are creating the Mailbox for the users we have stored in the CSV file. ##After all the mailboxes have been configured we will configure the Send Connector port for the Microsoft Exchange Server #############################################################################################################################
Set-Location 'C:\'
#SETTING THE FIRST NAME $FIRSTNAME1=('$FIRSTNAME1='+'"'+$first_name+'"')
#SETTING THE LAST NAME $LASTNAME1=('$LASTNAME1='+'"'+$last_name+'"')
#SETTING THE SAMACCOUNT $SAMACCOUNT1=('$SAMACCOUNT1='+'"'+$sam_account+'"')
#SETTING PRINCIPAL USERNAME $USERPRINCIPALNAME1=('$USERPRINCIPALNAME1='+'"'+$user_principal_name+'"')
#SETTING ACCOUNT PASSWORD $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1=('$PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1='+'"'+$password_for_account+'"')
#SETTING THE NAME VALUE $name=$user_principal_name | %{$data = [regex]::split($_, '\t|@'); Write-Output "$($data[0])"} $NAME1=('$NAME1='+'"'+$name+'"')
#ADDING THE VALUES IN THE sampleapp.ps1 FILE Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $NAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $FIRSTNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $LASTNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $SAMACCOUNT1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $USERPRINCIPALNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#creating a csv file " Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file = new-object System.IO.StreamWriter("C:\contacts.csv",[System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8)' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#ADDING FIELDS TO THE CSV FILE" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.WriteLine("Name,FirstName,LastName,SamAccount,UserPrincipalName")'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#Adding the values to the csv file" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.WriteLine("$NAME1,$FIRSTNAME1,$LASTNAME1,$SAMACCOUNT1,$USERPRINCIPALNAME1")' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.Close()'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "SUCCESSFULLY CREATED THE CSV FILE WITH USER INFORMATIONS"'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "##INSTALLING THE PACKAGE FOR RUNNING THE NEW-MAILBOX COMMAND" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Add-pssnapin microsoft*" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Install-CannedRbacRoles" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Install-CannedRbacRoleAssignments" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#CONVERTING THE PASSWORD TO THE SECURE STRING" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$PASSWORD = ConvertTo-SecureString $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1 -AsPlainText -Force' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#RUNNING THE COMMAND FOR CREATING USERS IN THE EXCHANGE SERVER" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$users = Import-Csv "C:\contacts.csv"' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$users|ForEach{' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'New-Mailbox -Name $_.Name -FirstName $_.FirstName -LastName $_.LastName -Alias $_.SamAccount -UserPrincipalName $_.UserPrincipalName -Password $PASSWORD' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "}" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "NEW MAILBOXES ADDED SUCCESSFULLY"' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#CONFIGURING THE SEND CONNECTOR PORT FOR EXCHANGE SERVER" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'New-SendConnector -Name "Send connector Port" -Usage Custom -AddressSpace "*" -DNSRoutingEnabled $True -MaxMessageSize 20MB' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "SEND CONNECTOR CONFIGURED"'
$domain_name="$domain" $domain_username="$domain_user" $domain_account="$domain_name\$domain_username" $domain_password="$domain_user_password" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "$domain_password" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "$domain_name\$domain_username",$domainPASS schtasks /CREATE /TN "Exchange_SampleApp" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\sampleapp.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "Exchange_SampleApp" $name=$user_principal_name | %{$data = [regex]::split($_, '\t|@'); Write-Output "$($data[0])"} echo " " echo "SAMPLE APPLICATION EXECUTED SUCCESSUFLLY" echo " " echo "FOR USAGE:-" echo " FROM WEB BROWSER ACCESS https://$self_ip/owa" echo " USERNAME:$domain\$name" echo " PASSWORD:$password_for_account"

################################################################### #SCRIPT TO SET THE DNS OF THE MACHINE #ADDING MACHINE TO DOMAIN #RENAMING THE MACHINE NAME AFTER JOINING THE DOMAIN ###################################################################
#VALIDATION FUNCTIONS Function check_error { if ($error.count -gt 0) { error_exit $args[0] } }
Function error_exit { echo $args[0] exit $lastexitcode }
#GETTING THE VALUE OF ALTERNATE DNS WHICH IS THE DEFAULT DNS OF A MACHINE ipconfig /all | Select-String -pattern "DNS Servers" > c:\DNS.txt $ALTERNATE_DNS = (Get-Content C:\DNS.txt)[1] | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace " DNS Servers . . . . . . . . . . . : ",""} check_error "ERROR:WHILE GETTING DNS VALUE"

#SAMPLE APPLICATION SCRIPT FOR EXCHANGE SERVER ############################################################################################################################ ##This sample application is for Testing the Installation of Microsoft Exchange Server on Windows 2008 R2 . ##In This sample application we are creating CSV file which has the informations of Different user we want ##to create for checking the installation we can create as many users as we want." ##After we have created the CSV file we are installing different pakages required for running NEW MAILBOX command. ##After that we are converting the password to Secure String so that it can be passed to the command. ##After that we are importing the CSV file we have created earlier. ##And Finally we are creating the Mailbox for the users we have stored in the CSV file. ##After all the mailboxes have been configured we will configure the Send Connector port for the Microsoft Exchange Server #############################################################################################################################
Set-Location 'C:\'
#SETTING THE FIRST NAME $FIRSTNAME1=('$FIRSTNAME1='+'"'+$first_name+'"')
#SETTING THE LAST NAME $LASTNAME1=('$LASTNAME1='+'"'+$last_name+'"')
#SETTING THE SAMACCOUNT $SAMACCOUNT1=('$SAMACCOUNT1='+'"'+$sam_account+'"')
#SETTING PRINCIPAL USERNAME $USERPRINCIPALNAME1=('$USERPRINCIPALNAME1='+'"'+$user_principal_name+'"')
#SETTING ACCOUNT PASSWORD $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1=('$PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1='+'"'+$password_for_account+'"')
#SETTING THE NAME VALUE $name=$user_principal_name | %{$data = [regex]::split($_, '\t|@'); Write-Output "$($data[0])"} $NAME1=('$NAME1='+'"'+$name+'"')
#ADDING THE VALUES IN THE sampleapp.ps1 FILE Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $NAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $FIRSTNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $LASTNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $SAMACCOUNT1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $USERPRINCIPALNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#creating a csv file " Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file = new-object System.IO.StreamWriter("C:\contacts.csv",[System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8)' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#ADDING FIELDS TO THE CSV FILE" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.WriteLine("Name,FirstName,LastName,SamAccount,UserPrincipalName")'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#Adding the values to the csv file" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.WriteLine("$NAME1,$FIRSTNAME1,$LASTNAME1,$SAMACCOUNT1,$USERPRINCIPALNAME1")' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.Close()'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "SUCCESSFULLY CREATED THE CSV FILE WITH USER INFORMATIONS"'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "##INSTALLING THE PACKAGE FOR RUNNING THE NEW-MAILBOX COMMAND" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Add-pssnapin microsoft*" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Install-CannedRbacRoles" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Install-CannedRbacRoleAssignments" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#CONVERTING THE PASSWORD TO THE SECURE STRING" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$PASSWORD = ConvertTo-SecureString $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1 -AsPlainText -Force' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#RUNNING THE COMMAND FOR CREATING USERS IN THE EXCHANGE SERVER" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$users = Import-Csv "C:\contacts.csv"' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$users|ForEach{' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'New-Mailbox -Name $_.Name -FirstName $_.FirstName -LastName $_.LastName -Alias $_.SamAccount -UserPrincipalName $_.UserPrincipalName -Password $PASSWORD' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "}" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "NEW MAILBOXES ADDED SUCCESSFULLY"' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#CONFIGURING THE SEND CONNECTOR PORT FOR EXCHANGE SERVER" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'New-SendConnector -Name "Send connector Port" -Usage Custom -AddressSpace "*" -DNSRoutingEnabled $True -MaxMessageSize 20MB' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "SEND CONNECTOR CONFIGURED"'
$domain_name="$domain" $domain_username="$domain_user" $domain_account="$domain_name\$domain_username" $domain_password="$domain_user_password" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "$domain_password" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "$domain_name\$domain_username",$domainPASS schtasks /CREATE /TN "Exchange_SampleApp" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\sampleapp.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "Exchange_SampleApp" $name=$user_principal_name | %{$data = [regex]::split($_, '\t|@'); Write-Output "$($data[0])"} echo " " echo "SAMPLE APPLICATION EXECUTED SUCCESSUFLLY" echo " " echo "FOR USAGE:-" echo " FROM WEB BROWSER ACCESS https://$self_ip/owa" echo " USERNAME:$domain\$name" echo " PASSWORD:$password_for_account"

task.content:
#SAMPLE APPLICATION SCRIPT FOR EXCHANGE SERVER ############################################################################################################################ ##This sample application is for Testing the Installation of Microsoft Exchange Server on Windows 2008 R2 . ##In This sample application we are creating CSV file which has the informations of Different user we want ##to create for checking the installation we can create as many users as we want." ##After we have created the CSV file we are installing different pakages required for running NEW MAILBOX command. ##After that we are converting the password to Secure String so that it can be passed to the command. ##After that we are importing the CSV file we have created earlier. ##And Finally we are creating the Mailbox for the users we have stored in the CSV file. ##After all the mailboxes have been configured we will configure the Send Connector port for the Microsoft Exchange Server #############################################################################################################################
Set-Location 'C:\'
#SETTING THE FIRST NAME $FIRSTNAME1=('$FIRSTNAME1='+'"'+$first_name+'"')
#SETTING THE LAST NAME $LASTNAME1=('$LASTNAME1='+'"'+$last_name+'"')
#SETTING THE SAMACCOUNT $SAMACCOUNT1=('$SAMACCOUNT1='+'"'+$sam_account+'"')
#SETTING PRINCIPAL USERNAME $USERPRINCIPALNAME1=('$USERPRINCIPALNAME1='+'"'+$user_principal_name+'"')
#SETTING ACCOUNT PASSWORD $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1=('$PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1='+'"'+$password_for_account+'"')
#SETTING THE NAME VALUE $name=$user_principal_name | %{$data = [regex]::split($_, '\t|@'); Write-Output "$($data[0])"} $NAME1=('$NAME1='+'"'+$name+'"')
#ADDING THE VALUES IN THE sampleapp.ps1 FILE Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $NAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $FIRSTNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $LASTNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $SAMACCOUNT1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $USERPRINCIPALNAME1 Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#creating a csv file " Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file = new-object System.IO.StreamWriter("C:\contacts.csv",[System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8)' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#ADDING FIELDS TO THE CSV FILE" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.WriteLine("Name,FirstName,LastName,SamAccount,UserPrincipalName")'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#Adding the values to the csv file" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.WriteLine("$NAME1,$FIRSTNAME1,$LASTNAME1,$SAMACCOUNT1,$USERPRINCIPALNAME1")' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$file.Close()'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "SUCCESSFULLY CREATED THE CSV FILE WITH USER INFORMATIONS"'
Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "##INSTALLING THE PACKAGE FOR RUNNING THE NEW-MAILBOX COMMAND" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Add-pssnapin microsoft*" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Install-CannedRbacRoles" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "Install-CannedRbacRoleAssignments" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#CONVERTING THE PASSWORD TO THE SECURE STRING" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$PASSWORD = ConvertTo-SecureString $PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT1 -AsPlainText -Force' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#RUNNING THE COMMAND FOR CREATING USERS IN THE EXCHANGE SERVER" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$users = Import-Csv "C:\contacts.csv"' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 '$users|ForEach{' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'New-Mailbox -Name $_.Name -FirstName $_.FirstName -LastName $_.LastName -Alias $_.SamAccount -UserPrincipalName $_.UserPrincipalName -Password $PASSWORD' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "}" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "NEW MAILBOXES ADDED SUCCESSFULLY"' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 "#CONFIGURING THE SEND CONNECTOR PORT FOR EXCHANGE SERVER" Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'New-SendConnector -Name "Send connector Port" -Usage Custom -AddressSpace "*" -DNSRoutingEnabled $True -MaxMessageSize 20MB' Add-Content sampleapp.ps1 'Write-Output "SEND CONNECTOR CONFIGURED"'
$domain_name="$domain" $domain_username="$domain_user" $domain_account="$domain_name\$domain_username" $domain_password="$domain_user_password" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "$domain_password" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "$domain_name\$domain_username",$domainPASS schtasks /CREATE /TN "Exchange_SampleApp" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\sampleapp.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "Exchange_SampleApp" $name=$user_principal_name | %{$data = [regex]::split($_, '\t|@'); Write-Output "$($data[0])"} echo " " echo "SAMPLE APPLICATION EXECUTED SUCCESSUFLLY" echo " " echo "FOR USAGE:-" echo " FROM WEB BROWSER ACCESS https://$self_ip/owa" echo " USERNAME:$domain\$name" echo " PASSWORD:$password_for_account"

################################################################### #SCRIPT TO SET THE DNS OF THE MACHINE #ADDING MACHINE TO DOMAIN #RENAMING THE MACHINE NAME AFTER JOINING THE DOMAIN ###################################################################
#VALIDATION FUNCTIONS Function check_error { if ($error.count -gt 0) { error_exit $args[0] } }
Function error_exit { echo $args[0] exit $lastexitcode }
#GETTING THE VALUE OF ALTERNATE DNS WHICH IS THE DEFAULT DNS OF A MACHINE ipconfig /all | Select-String -pattern "DNS Servers" > c:\DNS.txt $ALTERNATE_DNS = (Get-Content C:\DNS.txt)[1] | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace " DNS Servers . . . . . . . . . . . : ",""} check_error "ERROR:WHILE GETTING DNS VALUE"
##BLOCK FOR SETTING THE DNS AND ALTERNATE DNS #SETTING THE DOMAIN CONTROLLER IP INTO THE DNS OF THE MACHINE IN WHICH MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER IS GOING TO BE INSTALLED netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Local Area Connection" source=static address="$DOMAIN_CONTROLLER_IP" primary check_error "ERROR:WHILE SETTING THE PRIMARY DNS OF THE MACHINE"
#SETTING THE ALTERNATE DNS netsh interface ipv4 add dnsserver name="Local Area Connection" address="$ALTERNATE_DNS" index=2 check_error "ERROR:WHILE SETTING ALTERNATE DNS" Write-Output "DOMAIN CONTROLLER IP SET TO THE DNS!!"
#GETTING THE MACHINE NAME $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() Write-Output $DOMAINJOIN
#ADDING THE MACHINE TO THE DOMAIN netdom join $DOMAINJOIN /domain:$DOMAIN /userd:$DOMAIN_USERNAME /passwordd:$DOMAIN_PASSWORD check_error "ERROR:WHILE ADDING MACHINE TO DOMAIN" Write-Output "MACHINE ADDED TO THE DOMAIN"
Set-ExecutionPolicy remotesigned -force #$NEWNAME= "EXCHINSALL" #NETDOM RENAMECOMPUTER $DOMAINJOIN /NewName:$NEWNAME /userd:$DOMAIN\$DOMAIN_USERNAME /passwordd:$DOMAIN_PASSWORD /Force

######################################################################## ##SCRIPT TO INSTALL FILTER PACK AND MS EXCHANGE ########################################################################
#VALIDATION FUNCTIONS Function check_error { if ($error.count -gt 0) { error_exit $args[0] } }
Function error_exit { echo $args[0] exit $lastexitcode }
# For Client Access Server installation change startup mode of "Net.Tcp Port Sharing Service" from Manual to Auto Set-Service NetTcpPortSharing -StartupType Automatic check_error "ERROR:WHILE SETTING THE STARTUP MODE OF Net.Tcp Port Sharing Service"
Write-Output "INSTALLING MICROSOFT FILTER PACK" #SETTING THE LOCATION WHERE THE EXE OF THE FILTER PACK IS LOCATED Set-Location $DOWNLOAD_LOCATION_FILTERPACK
#INSTALLING MICROSOFT FILTER PACK .\FilterPackx64.exe /quiet /norestart check_error "ERROR:WHILE INSTALLING FILTER PACK" Write-Output "FILTER PACK SUCCESSFULLY INSTALLED"
#CREATING THE FOLDER TO EXTRACT MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER New-Item -path $EXTRACT_LOCATION_EXCHANGE -Itemtype directory
#SETTING THE LOCATION WHERE THE EXE OF THE MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER IS LOCATED Set-Location $EXCHANGE_DOWNLOAD_LOCATION
#EXTRACTING THE FILES FOR MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER ./Exchange_Server_Trial.exe /extract:"$EXTRACT_LOCATION_EXCHANGE" Write-Output "EXTRACTED MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER"
#RUNNING THE SETUP FILE FOR MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER Set-Location $EXTRACT_LOCATION_EXCHANGE
Start-Sleep 120
#TESTING IF THE SETUP FILE EXISTS OR NOT $PATH = Test-path $EXTRACT_LOCATION_EXCHANGE\setup.com
echo "path variable -->" echo $PATH
$wait_interval = 300 $wait_limit = 3000 $wait_c=0 do { if ($PATH -eq $true ) { break } else { Start-Sleep $wait_interval $wait_c = $wait_c + $wait_interval if ($wait_c -ge $wait_limit) { echo "ERROR:EXTRACTION OF EXCHANGE INSTALLER FAILED" exit 1 } Start-Sleep $wait_interval }
}while ($wait_c -le $wait_limit)
#KILLING MS EXTRACTION PROCESS taskkill /IM Exchange_Server_Trial.exe /F
$domain_account="$domain\$domain_username" echo "$domain_password" echo "$domain_account" Write-Output "INSTALLING MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SERVER" add-content c:\setup.ps1 "& `"$EXTRACT_LOCATION_EXCHANGE\setup.com`" /m:install /r:H C M" #schtasks /CREATE /TN "Install-MES" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\setup.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F #schtasks /RUN /TN "Install-MES"
& "$EXTRACT_LOCATION_EXCHANGE\setup.com" /m:install /r:H C M
Restart-Service "Microsoft*" Start-Sleep -Seconds 120
